mapper.sql: id, market_id, tenant_id, report_time, stock_count, stock_price, stock_day_avg, out_library_count, tenant_space, sales_count, sales_price, sales_avg_price, version, isvalid, register_time
mapper.select:
select iid.market_id AS marketId, m.name as 'marketName',
iid.tenant_id as 'tenantId', ut.tenant_name as 'tenantName',
IFNULL(SUM(iid.sales_count), 0) AS invoiceCount, IFNULL(SUM(iid.sales_price), 0) AS invoicePrice, IFNULL(SUM(iid.stock_count), 0) AS inventoryCount, IFNULL(SUM(iid.stock_price), 0) AS inventoryPrice
from inventory_invoice_day iid LEFT JOIN maxcar_user_l.`market` AS m ON iid.market_id = m.id LEFT JOIN `maxcar_tenant_l`.`user_tenant` AS ut ON iid.tenant_id = ut.id
where DATE_FORMAT(iid.report_time, '%Y-%m-%D') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() - 1, '%Y-%m-%D')
AND iid.market_id = #{marketId}
AND iid.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
group by iid.market_id
group by iid.market_id,iid.tenant_id
ORDER BY #{orderBy} DESC LIMIT 10
mapper.insert: insert into inventory_invoice_day (id, market_id, tenant_id, report_time, stock_count, stock_price, stock_day_avg, out_library_count, tenant_space, sales_count, sales_price, sales_avg_price, stock_day_price_avg , version, isvalid, register_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{marketId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stockPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{stockDayAvg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{outLibraryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tenantSpace,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salesCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salesPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{salesAvgPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{stockDayPriceAvg,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isvalid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE stock_count = VALUES (stock_count), stock_price = VALUES (stock_price), stock_day_avg = VALUES (stock_day_avg), out_library_count = VALUES (out_library_count), tenant_space = VALUES (tenant_space), sales_count = VALUES (sales_count), sales_price = VALUES (sales_price), sales_avg_price = VALUES (sales_avg_price), stock_day_price_avg = VALUES (stock_day_price_avg), version = VALUES (version), isvalid = VALUES (isvalid), register_time = now();

insert into inventory_invoice_day
id,
market_id,
tenant_id,
report_time,
stock_count,
stock_price,
stock_day_avg,
out_library_count,
tenant_space,
sales_count,
sales_price,
sales_avg_price,
version,
isvalid,
register_time,

#{marketId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{reportTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stockCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{stockPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{stockDayAvg,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{outLibraryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{salesCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{isvalid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update inventory_invoice_day
market_id = #{marketId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
report_time = #{reportTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stock_count = #{stockCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stock_price = #{stockPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
stock_day_avg = #{stockDayAvg,jdbcType=INTEGER},
out_library_count = #{outLibraryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tenant_space = #{tenantSpace,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sales_count = #{salesCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sales_price = #{salesPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
sales_avg_price = #{salesAvgPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isvalid = #{isvalid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update inventory_invoice_day set market_id = #{marketId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, report_time = #{reportTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_count = #{stockCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stock_price = #{stockPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, stock_day_avg = #{stockDayAvg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, out_library_count = #{outLibraryCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tenant_space = #{tenantSpace,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sales_count = #{salesCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sales_price = #{salesPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sales_avg_price = #{salesAvgPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isvalid = #{isvalid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(0) as count FROM( SELECT tenant_id, SUM(sales_count) AS sales_count FROM `inventory_invoice_day` WHERE isvalid = 1
AND market_id = #{marketId}
AND report_time BETWEEN #{timeStart} and #{timeEnd}
GROUP BY tenant_id) aa WHERE 1 = 1
AND aa.sales_count < 5
AND 4 < aa.sales_count and aa.sales_count < 10
AND 9 < aa.sales_count and aa.sales_count < 15
AND 14 < aa.sales_count and aa.sales_count < 20
AND 19 < aa.sales_count and aa.sales_count < 25
AND 24 < aa.sales_count and aa.sales_count < 30
AND 29 < aa.sales_count and aa.sales_count < 35
AND 24 < aa.sales_count and aa.sales_count < 40
AND 39 < aa.sales_count and aa.sales_count < 45
AND 44 < aa.sales_count and aa.sales_count < 50
AND 49 < aa.sales_count and aa.sales_count < 55

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `inventory_invoice_day` WHERE isvalid = 1
AND market_id = #{marketId}
AND tenant_id = #{tenantId}
AND report_time = #{monthNum}
AND stock_count < 5
AND 4 < stock_count and stock_count < 10
AND 9 < stock_count and stock_count < 15
AND 14 < stock_count and stock_count < 20
AND 19 < stock_count and stock_count < 25
AND 24 < stock_count and stock_count < 30
AND 29 < stock_count and stock_count < 35
AND 24 < stock_count and stock_count < 40
AND 39 < stock_count and stock_count < 45
AND 44 < stock_count and stock_count < 50
AND 49 < stock_count and stock_count < 55
ORDER BY report_time

SELECT COUNT(*) AS `count` FROM `inventory_invoice_day` WHERE isvalid = 1
AND market_id = #{marketId}
AND tenant_id = #{tenantId}
AND report_time = #{timeStart}
AND stock_count < 5
AND 4 < stock_count and stock_count < 10
AND 9 < stock_count and stock_count < 15
AND 14 < stock_count and stock_count < 20
AND 19 < stock_count and stock_count < 25
AND 24 < stock_count and stock_count < 30
AND 29 < stock_count and stock_count < 35
AND 24 < stock_count and stock_count < 40
AND 39 < stock_count and stock_count < 45
AND 44 < stock_count and stock_count < 50
AND 49 < stock_count and stock_count < 55

SELECT i.market_id, i.tenant_id, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AS report_time, COUNT(i.price) AS sales_count, IFNULL(SUM(i.price),0) AS sales_price, AVG(i.price) AS sales_avg_price, AVG(IFNULL(TO_DAYS(i.bill_time) - TO_DAYS(c.register_time),0)) AS stock_day_price_avg, COUNT(*) AS stock_count, SUM(cb.`market_price`) AS stock_price, AVG(TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(c.register_time)) AS stock_day_avg, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM maxcar_stock_l.car WHERE stock_status IN (4,5) AND update_time BETWEEN DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL - DAY(CURDATE()) + 1 DAY) AND DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(LAST_DAY(CURDATE()),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),INTERVAL 1 DAY ), INTERVAL - 1 SECOND) AND tenant = i.tenant_id) AS out_library_count FROM (maxcar_market_l.`invoice` i LEFT JOIN maxcar_stock_l.`car` c ON i.car_id = c.id) LEFT JOIN maxcar_stock_l.`car_base` cb ON c.id = cb.id WHERE invoice_status = 2 AND c.stock_status IN (1,2,3) AND c.car_type = 1 AND c.isvalid = 1 AND i.bill_time BETWEEN DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL - DAY(CURDATE()) + 1 DAY) AND NOW() GROUP BY i.tenant_id,i.market_id
